feed.title: blank
feed.subtitle: Passionate IC design engineer, engrossed in learning the field of integrated-circuit design (analog, digital and mixed-signal) and computer architecture.

entry.title: Why did I create this website (with a blog)?

link.title: Why did I create this website (with a blog)?

entry.content:
I never thought I would create a website for myself. Thanks to Maruan Al-Shedivat! His simple, neat and powerful academic theme named al-folio instigated me to create one.

I plan to write my thoughts here on this blog, every month, based on my schedule. Look out! Thanks for reading.

Edit (15-Aug-2023): I could not find much time either to write blog posts or maintain the site. Hence, I did a revamp of the site in August 2023.
